long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Control youtube with keyboard. Point your mouse to a preview and click keys to block video and channel and save. While playing like, dislike, save, and mirror. Click the extension icon in toolbar to see the shortcuts.

To undo an action, move your mouse over the preview to undo (for example after accidental block), and click the keyboard shortcut U for it.

While playing a video, click the home shortcut to go to Youtube Home. To save to a playlist, press S. 

Shortcuts work in fullscreen mode too.
